attributes.action: Put india on red list because of high rate of covid cases as per health report
attributes.additional_details: If india is on red list then there are many countries on red list with lower infection rate as per health organisations report so we demand india should go back on red list as per medical experts opinion.
attributes.background: As per health organisation report india have more infection rate of any country that is in red list. Uk government decided to remove india from red list because of trade interest not based on medical expert opinion.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

India to be added to red list for travel
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/582026
